posts.post_content:
Trying to upgrade some of the weaker elements of my near set.;)
Would consider trades or cash if you have an extra Hooker lying around the house.
Don't we all wish we had an extra Hooker lying around the house?

And it has a large hole...

[IMG]http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/08/t206-Hooker-Old-Mill-Southern-League.jpg[/IMG]

[quote name="t206blogcom" post=1050643]And it has a large hole...

[IMG]http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/08/t206-Hooker-Old-Mill-Southern-League.jpg[/IMG][/QUOTE]

My goodness, that's one tired Hooker.  Didn't realize mine was near mint as advertised until now.

My Hooker was found nailed to a stud inside of a Philadelphia bathroom wall during a remodeling project, along with two other SLs. During the auction, where the three cards were broken out into separate auctions, I picked up one of the other two cards - Paige:

[IMG]http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/08/t206-Paige-Old-Mill-Southern-League.jpg[/IMG]

Sorry to hijack your thread! You have a nice Hooker. :)

[quote name="t206blogcom" post=1050724]My Hooker was found nailed to a stud inside of a Philadelphia bathroom wall during a remodeling project, along with two other SLs. During the auction, where the three cards were broken out into separate auctions, I picked up one of the other two cards - Paige:

Sorry to hijack your thread! You have a nice Hooker. :)[/QUOTE]

Hooker... Nailed... Stud... All in the same sentence about a baseball card.

Jason,

Please use gloves when handling these cards.  Paige in a bathroom with a Hooker does not sound good, or safe.   Consider soaking them in a penicillin bath, but not at the same time.;)
It's a good thing we're not talking about a Bender or a Johnson.....
:D

[quote name="Michael Peich" post=1050732]It's a good thing we're not talking about a Bender or a Johnson.....[/QUOTE]

Thanks for the laugh.....................
lol...
I always considered myself lucky that my wife bought my Hooker for me as a gift.

[quote name="frankbmd" post=1050063]Trying to upgrade some of the weaker elements.;)
Would you have an extra Hooker.[/QUOTE]

Viagra works also!
Did you hear about the near sighted hooker?...you have to hand it to her.:)

[quote name="StuckInOmaha" post=1051350]I always considered myself lucky that my wife bought my Hooker for me as a gift.[/QUOTE]

Well Ed, I guess you will just have to send me your wife then.:D
I did pick up an ok Hooker at the National, but a better one was sent to me from Lancaster.

There's a nice looking, but expensive,... Hooker on ebay..

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/T206-Bock-Hooker-PSA-3-HINDU-Southern-League-/271096269487?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item3f1e98caaf[/url]

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/T206-Bock-Hooker-PSA-3-HINDU-Southern-League-/271096269487?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item3f1e98caaf[/url][/QUOTE]

Holy Cow.....a $1200 Hooker....(insert your own punchline):D

[quote name="Bocabirdman" post=1051472]Holy Cow.....a $1200 Hooker....(insert your own punchline):D[/QUOTE]

Probably one from Charlie Sheen's collection.....

What did the lepper say to the Hooker?


. . . . .



Keep the tip!

:D
